channel.title: Wheatley High-Poly Model
channel.description:
[b][[/b][b]Project Started[/b] - 16/8/10[b]][/b] [b][[/b][b]Applications Used[/b] - 3DS MAX 9 , Photoshop CS5[b]][/b][/SIZE]
[COLOR='DarkOrange'][b]-----------------[/b]
Thanks for the support guys; I'm still working on these models whenever I can find some free time. :slight_smile:
[COLOR='DarkOrange'][b][u]These models are not built to run inside the game; they are for artwork purposes only. As such, they will not be released.[/u][/b][/SIZE]
[COLOR='DarkOrange'][b]-----------------[/b]
| [url='https://img688.imageshack.us/img688/5860/upgraded.jpg'][b][COLOR='Lime'][u]Wheatley[/u][/b][/url] | [url='https://img828.imageshack.us/img828/5854/shinyi.jpg'][b][COLOR='Lime'][u]Portal Gun[/u][/b][/url] | [url='https://img196.imageshack.us/img196/2509/82985924.jpg'][b][u][COLOR='Lime']Pneumatic Arms[/u][/b][/url] | [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']GLaDOS[/b] | [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']Turret[/b] | [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']Atlas[/b] | [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']PotatOS[/b] [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']Motel[/b]

[b]Harry[/b].

item.title: Wheatley High-Poly Model
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Yeah, whenever I can find some spare time.

I use 3DS MAX 9. I’d love to see your work too!

I uses 3DS Max 12 student version, mind if I borrow Atlas to animate when you done?

Read full topic

item.title: Wheatley High-Poly Model
item.dc:creator: pendulum
item.description:
Great models! although the render can be done better to make them more realistic and less 3D. what kind of render software do you use?

Read full topic

item.title: Wheatley High-Poly Model
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
RobertBaldwin:

Are you still doing this? What program are you using?

Yeah, whenever I can find some spare time.

I use 3DS MAX 9. I’d love to see your work too!

Read full topic

item.title: Wheatley High-Poly Model
item.dc:creator: RobertBaldwin
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Quick update on ATLAS and a video that shows a bit of my modelling process!

[COLOR=‘Lime’]ATLAS - Model Process[/size]

Thanks,

Harry

Are you still doing this? I see that the post started a long time ago but your work is incredible. I’m going about making my own portal pieces in Maya. What program are you using?

Read full topic

Would have loved to use that Wheatly Gman model on my map though…

I mostly use Chamfering and Smoothing to get neat edges.
